DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test safety measles , mumps , rubella study vaccine make new measles stock seed ( component vaccine make 2003 ) rHA ( recombinant human albumin ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Measles , Mumps , Rubella Investigational Vaccine Trial ( V205C-010 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Healthy child 12 18 month age . Previous receipt measles , mumps , rubella and/or varicella vaccine . Prior infection exposure ( within last 4 week ) measles , mumps , rubella , varicella and/or zoster . Any medical condition might interfere immune response give vaccine ( include HIV infection and/or cancer ) undergone immunosuppressive ( weaken body 's ability fight infection ) therapy . History seizure ( convulsion ) Allergies component vaccine , include sorbitol , gelatin , neomycin . A recent ( within last 3 day ) illness result fever ( underarm temperature great 99.5° F [ 37.5° C ] ) .
